[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/config.rs] [Function: load_from_file()] [Type confusion] Does the serde_json::from_str() deserialization properly validate enum discriminants for BaseState, or can a malicious JSON file with invalid enum variants cause undefined behavior or type confusion leading to memory corruption? [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-transaction-simulation-session/src/config.rs] [Function: save_to_file()] [TOCTOU race condition] Is there a time-of-check-time-of-use race between path validation and std::fs::write(), allowing an attacker to swap a safe path with a symlink to a privileged file between validation and write?
